Source.Name: libxxf86dga
Source.Summary: X11 Direct Graphics Access extension library
Source.Description: libXxf86dga provides the XFree86-DGA extension, which allows direct graphics access to a framebuffer-like region, and also allows relative mouse reporting, et al. It is mainly used by games and emulators for games.
